Articles.Content:
Ladys and kerbals, I introduce, THE BEAST!

http://imgur.com/a/7U3tx Just look at the pictures as you read through, as I cant get them to embed directly.

It has then engines shooting pure awsome!

But It has a little problem, the fuel from the main tanks (both center and the 2 that are ducktaped on) will not go to the engines after it has used all of the small tanks fuel. Any help?

(it also has a habit of exploding when ASAS is active.)

1) The main 1 should have it\'s back end connected to its front end

2) Are you sure the fuel lines are correctly placed?

1) Im not sure what you mean by this?

2) They go from the small tanks to the large tanks.

1) Im not sure what you mean by this?

2) They go from the small tanks to the large tanks.

I mean that you should have your fuel lines go from your main\'s back end to the outer front ends (if possible)

I will download your craft and see what is wrong, if you give me a link or post it

Now I feel stupid, I had them running from the small tanks to the large, when I should have been running them from the large to small. Fixed now. thanks for the help.

Should I post the craft file?

Now I feel stupid, I had them running from the small tanks to the large, when I should have been running them from the large to small. Fixed now. thanks for the help.

Should I post the craft file?

Yeah, post the craft file. It\'d be interesting.

Also, I wanted to tell you after I realized like an hour later that you wrote 'from small to large' instead of 'from large to small'

Yeah, post the craft file. It\'d be interesting.

Also, I wanted to tell you after I realized like an hour later that you wrote 'from small to large' instead of 'from large to small'

LOL.

Any who, here yeah go.
